meanings.definition: The quality of being peppery in taste or smell.
meanings.sent1: The soup's pepperinesses made it too spicy for my taste.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the pepperinesses of black pepper on my salad.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected pepperinesses of the ice cream caught me by surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her words had a pepperinesses that stung like hot sauce.
meanings.sent5: The pepperinesses of the chili pepper lingered on my tongue.

meanings.definition: The state of having a sharp or pungent flavor like pepper.
meanings.sent1: The dish lacked the pepperinesses needed to bring out the flavors.
meanings.sent2: The salsa had just the right amount of pepperinesses to give it a kick.
meanings.sent3: The pepperinesses of the cheese made my taste buds dance.
meanings.sent4: The air was filled with the pepperinesses of spices from the market.
meanings.sent5: The pepperinesses of the curry left a lingering warmth in my mouth.
